name: bitsadmin

procedures: T1048.003::[BITSAdmin] can be used to create [BITS Jobs] to upload files from a compromised host.
T1105::[BITSAdmin] can be used to create [BITS Jobs] to upload and/or download files.
T1197::[BITSAdmin] can be used to create [BITS Jobs] to launch a malicious process.
T1570::[BITSAdmin] can be used to create [BITS Jobs] to upload and/or download files from SMB file servers.

description: [BITSAdmin](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0190) is a command line tool used to create and manage [BITS Jobs](https://attack.mitre.org/techniques/T1197). (Citation: Microsoft BITSAdmin)
